title: IT-Integrated Blended Education Course for Strengthening Basic Mathematical Job Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Elementary-Level Basic Mathematical Concepts
context.additional_context: An IT-integrated education course for corporate learners aged 40+ in managerial/leadership roles, aiming to strengthen mathematical job competencies in smartphone-based technological environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply mathematical problem-solving strategies with over 80% accuracy using a mobile platform.
Learners can provide peer feedback on mathematical learning with 100% participation using digital collaboration tools.
Learners can regularly measure their mathematical job competencies and achieve over 70% proficiency through an IT-based assessment system.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
